value.name: Matthew Patton looks to have 'fun with the kids' as 4-year run at BC comes to an end
value.description: As his time at Bakersfield College comes to a close, Matthew Patton's baseball career is finally starting to go the way he envisioned.

value.name: ‘It just breaks my heart’: Calgary family appeals for return of boy’s support dog
value.description: Out in his Calgary backyard on Wednesday, seven-year-old Matthew Patton was having fun playing with his mom and grandma. But he was also missing the company of his special four-legged friend.
